page.title: 07SCHOOL SURVEY 3
page.content: 7.What is your favourite breakfast food? -The majority said cereals, such as 'Weetabix' and cornflakes. 8. What is your favourite main meal food? -Chips were very popular. Meat, such as beef and chicken were often chosen. One girl wrote;"My mum's beef pies". All liked plain food - no foreign dishes mentioned. 9. What is your favourite sweet or pudding? -Most children said they preferred ice cream 10.What is your favourite teatime food? -More chips, chocolate cake. For many children, tea was a big meal too. 11.What is your favourite drink? -cold drinks-fizzy, eg.Coke. Hot -tea or coffee.
